entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 14.
